mdRecord.dcterms:title: Taylor Meeting: The friends of General Taylor without distinction of party, are requested to meet at the Court House, in Rockville, on Thursday next, 9th inst. at 3 o'clock, p.m., for the purpose of appointing a committee, to meet the delegates to assemble at Baltimore, on the 12th of April next, to nominate Gen. Taylor as the people's candidate for the next presidency. March 6, 1848
mdRecord.dcterms:description: SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: From the Papers of Robert Peter, 1696-1897, MSS 7605 and 7605-a
